Raschka
=======

[![badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/launch%20lab%20using%20binder-navigate%20using%20file%20explorer-E66581.svg?logo=data:image/png;base64,)][2]

Examples from [3][Raschka's book on ML]

Run these materials interactively
---------------------------------

To interact with these materials, we recommend using 
[the provided binder instance][2] or using 
[our implementation of jupyterhub][0]. 

If you use the jupyterhub implementation, your notebook will be running
on the main cluster and will require a proper python configuration (see
the following section, "Install Conda Env"). Be sure to use the
`pyintel` `conda` environment when running the notebooks on the cluster
for a consistent experience.


Install Conda Env
-----------------

From the cluster:

    interactive -t 15
    module load anaconda/py3
    conda env create -f environment.yml
    source activate pyintel

Helpful Links
-------------

* [Link to RC's jupyterhub (ASU RC account required)][0]
* [Link to request an ASU HPC account][1]
